officialTitle: Efficacy of Lidocaine as Local Anesthetics in Children Under Procedural Sedation and Analgesia Using Ketamine
inclusionCriteria:
* patients who need suturing for laceration under procedural anesthesia using ketamine
* Must have minimum age of 12 Months
* Must have maximum age of 10 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* contraindication to ketamine and lidocaine
* patients involved to other studies
* more or equal to American Society of Anesthesiologist (ASA) class III
* not alert
